about_the_game:
The Digital Artbook for IONIA captures more than the music-inspired adventure in a lush forest. The Rhythm of the Universe - Artbook gives a glimpse into an immense saga that captures the real-world collaboration of over 1000 musicians and artists from over 90 countries. Dive into a world of music mythology, a concept that turns musical theory symbols and concepts into lands, people, ecosystems, and game mechanics. An epic story that promotes empathy for others through universal languages.



he Rhythm of the Universe - Artbook is created by Emir Cerman and Charles Logan.

ROTU Entertainment is proud to support Wildlife Warriors USA Inc. For every purchase of Rhythm of the Universe: Ionia on the Steam United States “app” stores, ROTU Entertainment will donate 5% of its gross proceeds to Wildlife Warriors USA Inc.
